name: Transmogrified
description:
Transmogrified is a stealth game where the player needs to get throught the level avoiding enemies and different hazards using his magic abilities.

REMEMBER: They can hear you!

The tutorial is inside the game.

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

C: Crounch

P: Pause

Left Shift: Dash (If u have the potion)

E = grab/select objects

Once Selected:

       - Left Click to duplicate the selected object

      - Right Click to transform yourself into an object

-------------------------------------------------------------

ONLY WINDOWS SUPPORT FOR NOW!
